div.h4: What You'll LOVE about Soldier Hollow

h6.a: Instilling appreciation and respect for nature
Taking the classroom into the natural world
Building confidence and becoming a team

div.p: Soldier Hollow Charter School is an award winning, free public charter school located in beautiful Charleston, Utah. We serve students in Grades Pre-K through 8th Grade.
